title: Peacemaker season 2 is here! How to watch John Cena as Chris Smith on Sling with HBO Max
description: John Cena returns as Chris Smith in DC Studios' Peacemaker. How to stream season 2 on Sling with HBO Max now:
content:
• The eight-episode season will release weekly, concluding on October 9th.
• Sling offers a discounted bundle with HBO Max, and the first month is half-price.

I'm not saying that Marvel is falling off, but this new phase isn't what the Avengers prepared us for. Do you still need your superhero fix? DC has you covered with season 2 of Peacemaker. John Cena returns as the main character in the spinoff of the DC Extended Universe series, which you can watch on Sling with HBO Max.

Season 2 of Peacemaker is set to premiere on Thursday, Aug. 21 on HBO Max, which you can add-on to your Sling subscription. It's been long-awaited as the first season debuted in early 2022. Showrunner James Gunn was named the CEO of DC Studios and had to switch focus to other projects. But, Peacemaker fans are finally getting their second season!

Here's everything you need to know in order to stream Peacemaker Season 2 on Sling with HBO Max:

How to watch Peacemaker Season 2 on Sling with HBO Max

Peacemakers Season 2 premieres on HBO Max on Thursday, Aug. 21 at 9 p.m. The second season will consist of eight episodes. New episodes will air every Thursday until the finale is released on Thursday, Oct. 9.

How much does the Sling + HBO Max bundle cost?

Sling TV has several add-on packages that allow you to customize your at-home streaming experience with more sports, movies and entertainment. Get your first month of Sling for 50% off and score $5 off per month after that when you sign up for the Sling Blue and HBO Max bundle. Your first month of Sling Blue and Max add-on will start at $34.99 (normally $57.97) and include access to the HBO Max app, HBO Channels and On Demand. Prices will vary depending on other add-ons and offers you choose to include in your package. Here is a break down of the differences between Sling Orange and Sling Blue:

What's the difference between Sling Blue and Sling Orange?
• Sling Orange: The Sling Orange package has over 30 channels, including popular networks like ESPN, Disney Channel, CNN and HGTV. This is a popular pick for families and sports fans who want access to live game coverage and kid-friendly content. Sling Orange allows streaming on one device.
• Sling Blue: With more than 45 channels, Sling Blue caters to a wider audience with major networks like FOX, NBC, Bravo and National Geographic. This package is perfect for those who enjoy a nice mix of news, reality television and lifestyle programming. Sling Blue allows streaming on up to three devices.
summary: The second season of DC's superhero series Peacemaker is set to premiere on HBO Max on August 21. The eight-episode season will release weekly, concluding on October 9th. Sling offers a discounted bundle with HBO Max, and the first month of the Sling subscription is half-price. The second season will consist of eight episodes. The Sling Blue and Max add-ons start at $34.99 and include access to the HBO Max app, HBO Channels and On Demand.
shortSummary: "Peacemaker season 2 premieres on HBO Max, available to watch on Sling TV with a discounted bundle, featuring John Cena as Chris Smith, with Sling offering discounts.

New fear unlocked? Watch Final Destination Bloodlines on Sling with HBO Max now
Do you need new irrational fears? There's a new movie just for you. Final Destination Bloodlines is available to stream on HBO Max with Sling. Yes, the movie that gave all of the millennials fear of airplanes, birds, tanning beds, elevators, sheets of glass and more—it's back.
Final Destination Bloodlines hit theaters on May 16, 2025, where it grossed $285 million at the box office, according to IMDb, and is currently sporting a 93% on Rotten Tomatoes. Now, you don't have to head to theaters to get this high-rating horror film, you can watch it at home with HBO Max on Sling.
Here's how to stream Final Destination Bloodlines on Sling with HBO Max:
How to watch Final Destination Bloodlines on HBO Max with Sling
Final Destination Bloodlines is available now on Sling with HBO Max.

This package is perfect for those who enjoy a nice mix of news, reality television and lifestyle programming. Sling Blue allows streaming on up to three devices. Surprise! Everyone's favorite serial killer is back! Watch 'Dexter: Resurrection' on Sling
Surprise! Dexter is back. Everyone's favorite serial killer is gracing our screens with his broody vigilantism once more. The first two episodes will be available to stream on Paramount+ on Friday, while episodes will also air weekly on Showtime on Sundays. Both options are available on Sling.
This is the second sequel to the original showtime hit series, "Dexter." "Dexter: New Blood" premiered in 2021, taking place ten years after the original series ended. Dexter is living under an alias in Iron Lake, New York and has managed to suppressed his need to kill. But, his son Harrison arrives, eventually discovered his dad's dark history leading to a confrontation. At the end of "Dexter: New Blood," Harrison shoots his father. That's where "Dexter: Resurrection" will pick up.
Here's how to stream "Dexter: Resurrection" on Sling:
Watch "Dexter: Resurrection" on Sling
How to stream "Dexter: Resurrection" on Sling
"Dexter: Resurrection" episodes will air regularly on Showtime, every Sunday at 8 p.m. ET starting on Sunday, July 13.
It will also stream on Paramount+ with Showtime, which is available as a Sling add-on. The first two episodes will be available on Friday, July 11.
How much does Sling cost?
Sling TV has flexible and affordable plans all year long and regularly offers special deals to help you save even more. Get your first month of Sling for 50% off right now. Prices will vary depending on other add-ons and offers you select. Below, we break down the differences between Sling Orange and Sling Blue.
How much is the Sling Paramount+ with Showtime add-on?
Paramount+ with Showtime can be added to your Sling TV lineup for $10/mo.
What is the difference between Sling Orange and Sling Blue?
- Sling Blue: With more than 45 channels, Sling Blue caters to a wider audience with major networks like FOX, NBC, Bravo and National Geographic. This package is perfect for those who enjoy a nice mix of news, reality television and lifestyle programming. Sling Blue allows streaming on up to three devices. Part 1 of the Billy Joel documentary is out now: Here's how to watch on Sling
The highly-anticipated first part of the documentary on legendary singer Billy Joel is now streaming.
The two-part documentary, titled, 'Billy Joel: And So It Goes,' offers an in-depth look at Joel's life and music career, which features his struggles, never-before-seen performances and one-on-one interviews.
For many fans of the Hall of Fame singer, the documentary is sure to be a must-watch as it gives unprecedented access on Joel's life, both on and off stage.
While the documentary airs on HBO Max, a great option for Joel fans to watch the program is with a subscription to Sling. Here's how:
How to Watch 'Billy Joel: And So It Goes' on Sling
'Billy Joel: And So It Goes' is available with a Sling + HBO Max plan. A Sling Blue + HBO Max or Sling Orange & Blue + HBO Max plan gives you access to HBO Max entertainment, so Sling users can watch the film there.

Women's basketball is back! Here's how to watch the WNBA season on Sling with free options
With the draft and preseason in the books, it's time to begin the 2025 WNBA season with storylines aplenty.
Beginning with the draft, No. 1 overall pick Paige Bueckers brings a championship pedigree to a struggling franchise in the Dallas Wings as the team looks for major improvement alongside its other first round pick, Aziaha James.
Then there's the New York Liberty who look to go back-to-back for the WNBA championship. However, a hungry Minnesota Lynx team may have something to say about it after losing in heartbreaking fashion in the WNBA Finals.
Watch the WNBA season with Sling
Additionally, plenty of young stars are looking to lift their respective teams far like Caitlin Clark and the Indiana Fever, Angel Reese and the Chicago Sky and Rhyne Howard with the Atlanta Dream among others.
With many of the WNBA games airing across ION, ESPN and NBA TV, most streaming services don't offer a way to tune in. However, a subscription to Sling allows fans to access the majority of the WNBA regular season schedule.
To catch the most WNBA schedule this season, here's how basketball fans can watch their favorite team in action on Sling and get $10 off your first month.

- Los Angeles Sparks vs. Golden State Valkyries - 10 p.m. ET - Watch on Sling

Stream 'Sinners' for free on HBO Max with Sling today
- The movie "Sinners" is available to stream on HBO Max with Sling starting July 4th.
- A version featuring Black American Sign Language (BASL) will also be available.
- The first month of Sling Blue with HBO Max is currently discounted to $34.99.
- Sling Blue offers more than 45 channels and allows streaming on up to three devices.
'Sinners' has quickly become one of the hottest movies of 2025, boasting an incredible cast. While I haven't had the chance to see this horror film myself, the pairing of Michael B. Jordan and Hailee Steinfeld is more than enough to pique my interest. 'Sinners' was released to theaters on April 18, 2025, and was available for rent or purchase on June 3. Now this Ryan Coogler blockbuster is available to stream for free on HBO Max with Sling.
When does 'Sinners' release on HBO Max?
'Sinners' is available to stream on HBO Max with Sling on Friday, July 4. The streaming platform will be adding the original version and a second version featuring Black American Sign Language (BASL). The new version will feature a performance by interpreter Nakia Smith, working under the direction of Rosa Lee Timm, who previously directed the American Sign Language (ASL) versions for other major Warner Bros. Pictures releases.

How to watch NASCAR Daytona 500 weekend, TV channel, live stream
Ladies and gentlemen, start your engines.
The 2025 NASCAR season gets into gear this weekend with the 67th running of the Daytona 500.
Very few sports kick off the season with such a signature event, as this weekend is one both racing fans and the racers themselves circle on their calendars each year.
Here's everything you need to know in order to watch all the action out of Daytona this weekend.
How to watch Daytona 500
Daytona action is already underway after the Duels at Daytona qualifying races on Thursday, Feb. 13. That said, the best is yet to come as we have a full weekend of racing action at Daytona.
Whether you're most interested in Friday's qualifying or truck race, Saturday's practice and multiple races, or the Daytona 500 itself on Sunday, you can catch all the NASCAR action with Sling.
Watch Daytona 500 weekend on Sling
How to live stream Daytona 500
All NASCAR races on FOX, and NBC will be available in their markets and all races on FS1, TNT or USA will be available nationwide with a subscription to either Sling Orange or Sling Blue, the two most popular packages from Sling.
Daytona 500 race information
- When: 2:30 p.m. ET on Sunday, Feb. 16
- Where: Daytona International Speedway in Daytona Beach, Fla.
- Length: 200 laps | 500 miles
- TV channel: FOX (watch on Sling)
- Streaming: Sling
Watch the Daytona 500 on Sling
Daytona 500 full weekend schedule
Friday, February 14
- 3 p.m. — NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series qualifying
- 4:30 p.m. — NASCAR Xfinity Series practice
- 5:30 p.m. — NASCAR Cup Series practice
- 7:30 p.m. — Fresh From Florida 250 Truck Series race
Saturday, February 15
- 10 a.m. — NASCAR Xfinity Series qualifying
- Noon — Ride the 'Dente 200 ARCA Menards Series race (80 laps, 200 miles)
- 3 p.m. — NASCAR Cup Series final practice
- 5 p.m. — United Rentals 300 Xfinity Series race (120 laps, 300 miles)
Sunday, February 16
- 2:30 p.m. — Daytona 500 Cup Series race, FOX (Watch on Sling)
Watch the Daytona 500 with Sling

When does 'Peacemaker' Season 2 come out? Premiere date, time, cast, where to watch
John Cena is back to spread more peace with Season 2 of "Peacemaker."
Based on the character from James Gunn's 2021 film "The Suicide Squad," the series follows the "explosive escapades" of Peacemaker, "a compellingly vainglorious man who believes in peace at any cost, no matter how many people he has to kill to get it," according to HBO.
In Season 2 of the series, Peacemaker "discovers an alternate world where life is everything he wishes it could be." However, it is also puts him in a position where he is forced "to face his traumatic past and take the future into his own hands."
Cena, during a Season 2 panel for the action-comedy series at Comic-Con, said Peacemaker “is going through a rough patch in life and thinks the grass might be greener on the other side.”
“That’s something people can relate to," the actor had added.
All eight episodes of "Peacemaker" Season 2 have been written by James Gunn, who also directed three episodes this season, including the first. "Peacemaker" is also the first original DC show to have its series premiere on HBO Max, according to HBO Max Head of Original Content Sarah Aubrey.
Gunn, meanwhile, at Comic-Con teased that Season 2 is more extreme than the first and is definitely not for kids – there’s a very sexual situation in the first episode that made actor Steve Agee (John Economos) think “it’s insane we’re showing it on cable.”
Watch 'Peacemaker' with Sling + Max
Here's what to know about Season 2 of "Peacemaker," including the release date and cast.
We've got room on the couch! Sign up for USA TODAY's Watch Party newsletter for more recaps of your favorite shows.
'Peacemaker' Season 2 release date
Season 2 of "Peacemaker" is scheduled to premiere Thursday, Aug. 21 at 9 p.m. ET/PT on Max.
Need a break? Play the USA TODAY Daily Crossword Puzzle
How to watch 'Peacemaker' Season 2
Season 2 of "Peacemaker" will be available to stream on Max, weekly on Thursdays at 9 p.m. ET/PT.
Season 1 of "Peacemaker" is also available to stream on HBO Max.
Watch 'Peacemaker' with Sling + Max
How many episodes will 'Peacemaker' Season 2 have?
Season 2 of “Peacemaker” will have eight episodes, according to HBO Max.
'Peacemaker' Season 2 cast
- John Cena as Chris Smith / Peacemaker
- Danielle Brooks as is Leota Adebayo
- Jennifer Holland as Emilia Harcourt
- Steve Agee as John Economos
- Freddie Stroma
- Robert Patrick
New cast members include:
- Frank Grillo
- David Denman
- Sol Rodriguez
- Tim Meadows
Watch Peacemaker' trailer
Contributing: Brian Truitt, USA TODAY

argos_summary: Peacemaker Season 2, starring John Cena, premieres on HBO Max on August 21 and runs for eight weekly episodes, concluding on October 9. The series is available to stream through a Sling + HBO Max add‑on, which offers the first month at $34.99 (half‑price) and $5 off each subsequent month. Sling’s Blue and Orange packages differ in channel count and device limits, with the Blue plan allowing up to three devices and the Orange plan one. In addition to Peacemaker, Sling users can also watch new releases such as Final Destination Bloodlines, Dexter: Resurrection, the Billy Joel documentary, and WNBA games, many of which are available at discounted or free rates with Sling’s sports and entertainment add‑ons.
